permafrost.tundra.tn.delivery

Class CallableGuaranteedJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.tn.delivery.CallableGuaranteedJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<com.wm.data.IData>

    public class CallableGuaranteedJob
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<com.wm.data.IData>
    Callable for invoking a given service against a given job.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String DEQUEUED_USER_STATUS
      The bizdoc user status to use when a job is dequeued.
      private java.lang.String exhaustedStatus
      The user status a BizDocEnvelope is set to if all deliveries of the job are exhausted.
      private com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob job
      The job against which the service will be invoked.
      private static int MAX_RETRIES
      The number of retries when trying to complete a job.
      private com.wm.data.IData pipeline
      The pipeline the service is invoked with.
      private com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue
      The delivery queue from which the job was dequeued.
      private float retryFactor
      The retry factor to be used when retrying the job.
      private int retryLimit
      The maximum number of retries.
      private com.wm.lang.ns.NSName service
      The service to be invoked.
      private com.wm.app.b2b.server.Session session
      The session the service is invoked under.
      private boolean statusSilence
      Whether the owning bizdoc's status should be changed to reflect job success/failure.
      private boolean suspend
      Whether the deliver queue should be suspended on retry exhaustion.
      private javax.xml.datatype.Duration timeToWait
      The time to wait between retries.
      private static int TRANSPORT_STATUS_MESSAGE_LENGTH
      The transport status message character length supported by Trading Networks.
      private static long WAIT_BETWEEN_RETRIES_MILLISECONDS
      How long to wait between each retry when trying to complete a job.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CallableGuaranteedJob

        public CallableGuaranteedJob(com.wm.app.tn.delivery.DeliveryQueue queue,
                             com.wm.app.tn.delivery.GuaranteedJob job,
                             java.lang.String service,
                             com.wm.app.b2b.server.Session session,
                             com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                             int retryLimit,
                             float retryFactor,
                             javax.xml.datatype.Duration timeToWait,
                             boolean suspend,
                             java.lang.String exhaustedStatus)
        Creates a new CallableGuaranteedJob which when called invokes the given service against the given job.
        Parameters:
        queue - The delivery queue on which the job queued.
        job - The job to be processed.
        service - The service to be invoked to process the given job.
        session - The session used when invoking the given service.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the given service.
        retryLimit - The number of retries this job should attempt.
        retryFactor - The factor used to extend the time to wait on each retry.
        timeToWait - The time to wait between each retry.
        suspend - Whether to suspend the delivery queue on job retry exhaustion.
        exhaustedStatus - The status set on the related bizdoc when all retries of the job are exhausted.

        Parameters:
        queue - The delivery queue on which the job queued.
        job - The job to be processed.
        service - The service to be invoked to process the given job.
        session - The session used when invoking the given service.
        pipeline - The input pipeline used when invoking the given service.
        retryLimit - The number of retries this job should attempt.
        retryFactor - The factor used to extend the time to wait on each retry.
        timeToWait - The time to wait between each retry.
        suspend - Whether to suspend the delivery queue on job retry exhaustion.
        exhaustedStatus - The status set on the related bizdoc when all retries of the job are exhaused.

      • call

        public com.wm.data.IData call()
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Invokes the provided service with the provided pipeline and session against the job.
        Specified by:
        call in interface java.util.concurrent.Callable<com.wm.data.IData>
        Returns:
        The output pipeline returned by the invocation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the service encounters an error.

      • setJobCompleted

        private void setJobCompleted(com.wm.data.IData serviceOutput,
                             java.lang.Throwable exception,
                             long duration)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the job as either successfully or unsuccessfully completed, depending on whether and exception is provided.
        Parameters:
        serviceOutput - The output of the service used to process the job.
        exception - Optional exception encountered while processing the job.
        duration - The time taken to process the job in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If a database error occurs.
